name: Feed The Alien
description:
An alien with a massive craving for exotic (to its standards) food invaded the planet. It promises to leave in peace if you can satisfy its cravings!

Cook different dishes for the alien to eat and it will leave the planet.

Choose different ingredients and consult the recipe book  to cook food. If you think you made the right dish present it to the alien

Click the ingredients on the ingredients tab to move them to your inventory.

Drag and drop items from your inventory to the crafting panel to craft.

There are three input panels in the crafting panel and one output panel. 
Click the resulting output to move the crafted item to your inventory.

Assets used

Some food icons are from
https://henrysoftware.itch.io/pixel-food

https://vectorpixelstar.itch.io/food

Some UI assets from
https://karwisch.itch.io/pxui-basic
